content: You can now directly link to the source of a markdown file on GitHub by adding ?plain=1 to the URL, such as https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/README.md?plain=1#L19-L28. I have wanted that for a long time.
Ah, nice. I use the raw links all the time, but it's nice to include the rest of the UI to let someone navigate.
great news, thanks @Eric Huss for sharing, always been a papercut for me too
